com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.touch.siteadmin

Interface SiteadminActions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteadminPage, SiteadminPage

    public interface SiteadminActions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SiteadminActions copyPage(String title, String destination)
      Copies the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Copy button on Action Bar.
      SiteadminActions createNewPage(String title, String templateName)
      Creates a new page based on the provided values.
      SiteadminActions createNewPage(String title, String name, String templateName)
      Creates a new page based on provided the values.
      SiteadminActions deletePage(String title)
      Deletes the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Delete button on Action Bar.
      SiteadminActions deleteSubPages()
      Deletes all sub pages if contains any
      SiteadminChildPage getPageFromList(String title)
      Returns page
      boolean hasChildPages()
      Checks if page contains sub pages
      boolean isPagePresent(String title)
      Checks if a page with provided title is displayed in the SiteAdminGrid.
      SiteadminActions movePage(String title, String destinationPath)
      Moves the page with provided title to provided destination path by selecting it and pressing Move button on Action Bar
      SiteadminActions open()
      Opens Site Admin main page: http://domain/siteadmin#.
      SiteadminActions open(String nodePath)
      Opens Site Admin at specified node: http://domain/siteadmin#/nodePath
      SiteadminActions publishPage(String title)
      Activates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Activate button on Action Bar.
      SiteadminActions publishPageLater(String title, LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Activates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Activate Later button in Activate drop down.
      SiteadminActions unpublishPage(String title)
      Deactivates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Dectivate button on Action Bar.
      SiteadminActions unpublishPageLater(String title, LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Deactivates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Deactivate Later button in Deactivate drop down.
      SiteadminActions waitForPageCount(int pageCount)
      Waits until there is requested number of subPages on actual page list.

    • Method Detail

      • publishPage

        SiteadminActions publishPage(String title)
        Activates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Activate button on Action Bar.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • publishPageLater

        SiteadminActions publishPageLater(String title,
                                  LocalDateTime localDateTime)
        Activates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Activate Later button in Activate drop down.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        localDateTime - date and time in the future
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • copyPage

        SiteadminActions copyPage(String title,
                          String destination)
        Copies the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Copy button on Action Bar.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        destination - copy destination
        Returns:
        this SiteAdminPage

      • createNewPage

        SiteadminActions createNewPage(String title,
                               String name,
                               String templateName)
        Creates a new page based on provided the values. During creation specified template is used in CreatePageWindow.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the created page
        name - name of the created page
        templateName - template of the created page
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • createNewPage

        SiteadminActions createNewPage(String title,
                               String templateName)
        Creates a new page based on the provided values. name is omitted (default one is set by AEM). During creation specified template is used in CreatePageWindow
        Parameters:
        title - title of the created page
        templateName - template of the created page
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • waitForPageCount

        SiteadminActions waitForPageCount(int pageCount)
        Waits until there is requested number of subPages on actual page list. During waiting page is reloaded several times.
        Parameters:
        pageCount - number of pages that is expected to appear
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • unpublishPage

        SiteadminActions unpublishPage(String title)
        Deactivates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Dectivate button on Action Bar.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        Returns:
        this SiteAdminPage

      • unpublishPageLater

        SiteadminActions unpublishPageLater(String title,
                                    LocalDateTime localDateTime)
        Deactivates the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Deactivate Later button in Deactivate drop down.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        localDateTime - date and time in the future
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • deletePage

        SiteadminActions deletePage(String title)
        Deletes the page with provided title by selecting it and pressing Delete button on Action Bar. Verifies that page is deleted.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        Returns:
        this SiteAdminPage

      • deleteSubPages

        SiteadminActions deleteSubPages()
        Deletes all sub pages if contains any
        Returns:
        this SiteAdminPage

      • isPagePresent

        boolean isPagePresent(String title)
        Checks if a page with provided title is displayed in the SiteAdminGrid.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the page
        Returns:
        true if page is present

      • movePage

        SiteadminActions movePage(String title,
                          String destinationPath)
        Moves the page with provided title to provided destination path by selecting it and pressing Move button on Action Bar
        Parameters:
        title - page title
        destinationPath - destination page path
        Returns:
        this SiteadminPage

      • open

        SiteadminActions open(String nodePath)
        Opens Site Admin at specified node: http://domain/siteadmin#/nodePath
        Parameters:
        nodePath - path to the node
        Returns:
        Site Admin grid

      • open

        SiteadminActions open()
        Opens Site Admin main page: http://domain/siteadmin#.
        Returns:
        This SiteAdminPage

        boolean hasChildPages()
        Checks if page contains sub pages
        Returns:
        true if contains sub pages
